Description
Ranged Enemy labs change the stats of ranged
enemies
during rounds. When labs are researched, the base modifiers between enemies will no longer be accurate (ex: boss health will not always be x20 basic if basic health is researched).
Ranged Enemy Health
Ranged Enemy Attack
Ranged Enemy Range
Ranged Enemy Health Research
Unlocked
lab
in
Milestones
at tier 9 wave 20. Decreases ranged enemy health at all waves. Has 30 levels.
Level
Time
Cost
Expand
Value

Ranged Enemy Range Lab
Unlocked in Tier 13 Wave 80. Reduces the attack range of the Ranged Enemy type. Has 30 Levels.

Expand
